SEARCH
Package org.newsclub.net.unix

Interface AddressSpecifics<A extends SocketAddress>

Type Parameters:
A - The socket address.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AFTIPCAddressSpecifics, AFUNIXAddressSpecifics, AFVSOCKAddressSpecifics, JavaAddressSpecifics
public interface AddressSpecifics<A extends SocketAddress>
Test-related methods to work with a particular AFSocket implementation. It is essential to use these methods in tests instead of directly calling the AFSocket etc. methods: Some socket implementations (and sometimes only in certain kernel/environment configurations) may expose unexpected behavior that is otherwise hard to catch. This is especially relevant when connecting/binding sockets.
Author:
Christian Kohlschütter
See Also:
  • SocketTestBase
